thread.title: Dehumidified Air Ensures Quality Hormone Packaging for Orion Pharmaceuticals
thread.title_full: Dehumidified Air Ensures Quality Hormone Packaging for Orion Pharmaceuticals

title: Dehumidified Air Ensures Quality Hormone Packaging for Orion Pharmaceuticals
text:
Dehumidified Air Ensures Quality Hormone Packaging for Orion Pharmaceuticals 03 September 2015 by Munters Print Email Company Details 
Production of hormone medication involves packing in foil blister packs. The process includes cooling and requires very cold machine surfaces. 
This precision production demands high indoor air quality to prevent problems with condensation during different manufacturing stages of the blister packing to ensure high quality stability of the products in the future. 
Download to find out more. Available Downloads
